welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Gelnhausen, Germany! Get ready to be charmed by our city's historic buildings, cozy cafes, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience all that Gelnhausen has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Reichelsheim Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving Lufthansa and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A new terminal currently under construction, set to open in 2023 and increase the airport's capacity.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, mostly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
